question: Write a letter to your internet service provider to complain. In the letter:- Describe the problem and why you are unhappy- Arrange for an engineer to visit your home- Request a reduction in your bill
text: I am a loyal customer of yours, using fibre internet service since you established your brand two years ago. I am writing this letter to express my frustration with your customer service and to request your support on urgent maintenance and cost adjustment.

Starting early this month, I encountered  internet connection instability at my home. I contacted your call centre and followed the steps they instructed me to troubleshoot the possible causes. Although they tried to fix the problem remotely, the data speed was still fluctuating. Therefore, I requested the call centre to send an engineer to check the hardware at my home, but they did not reply to my request for a week. Even though I tried to contact them again and again, they did not answer my calls anymore.

Since I am working from home and I have to arrange a series of critical meetings in the upcoming weeks, I want you to send an engineer to check and fix the problem as soon as possible. You can book a timeslot for the maintenance via this email or you can reach me via my mobile phone at 09-8767-1253 for instant communication.

Furthermore, I received a yearly invoice from your finance department yesterday and found out that they already included the bill for this month. I would like you to waive the monthly fees for this month because I have to use my mobile internet for the entire month as I cannot rely on your unstable internet.
I hope you understand my situation and will provide the requested support accordingly. Your prompt actions on each topic would be much appreciated.
